overview: Spencer Reiss covers new media, alternative energy & commercial space travel for Wired magazine. He also directs the program for the annual Monaco Media Forum. A former Newsweek correspondent in Africa, the Middle East and Latin America, he lives with his wife and three perfect children in Salisbury, Connecticut USA.
